About Me

let me tell you a few things

BIO

Front-End Web Developer

Dynamic, motivated Professional with the educational background and proven work ethic to support all aspects of web development. Known for delivering excellent service in fast-paced environments, with the skillset to handle user interface design, code structuring, troubleshooting, project management, and more.
Out-of-the-box thinker who is comfortable working in teams or independently to ensure results consistently meet or exceed business goals. Exceptional training and academic qualifications, including a Bachelor of Arts degree as well as a Web Development PGCert from the University of Sussex.

University of Sussex

I studied a nine months course at Sussex University, where I learnt the fundamentals of Web Development, user experience, user design and programming.
